about.name: Code
about.description: Ramp up your front end skills. They can only get better. Speakers drop knowledge, you leave inspired. It’s that simple. Revel in the live code examples and thoughtful conversations.

about.name: Connect
about.description: Network with like-minded professionals in the industry. Leverage Fore_Front’s inclusive atmosphere to build friendships, partnerships, and mentorships.

about.name: Caffeinate
about.description: But first and foremost, coffee. You bring the enthusiasm, we’ll provide caffeine (and bagels... So. Many. Bagels).
